body_content.explanation: using artificial chemicals in the growing or raising of plants and animals for food and other products:
examples: These carrots have been grown inorganically.
The inorganically fertilized wheat produced a higher yield.

body_content.explanation: If a business grows inorganically, it buys other companies rather than developing its own business:
examples: If you want your business to grow inorganically, you need to have more capital to invest.
We are committed to expanding our domestic and international business inorganically.
